name: Photo Scan
description: DO YOU NEED TO SCAN PHOTOS ... EASY, FAST AND SAFE?  Mobile Photo Scanner is the best solution on United Estates!  There are many photo scanner applications however, this application offers quick and easy, photo digitizing, qr codes and barcodes, to share or store quickly.  Photo Scanner is a small scanner application that turns the Android device into a portable photo scanner and scan everything as images or PDF files.  With this Photo Scanner application you can scan documents, photos, drawings, receipts, reports or anything. This photo scanner application is fast and is designed for the phone and desktop.  Photo Scanner is an application that turns your mobile phone into a portable scanner. Scans are saved on your device as images or PDF files. Name and organize your scans, or share them by:  - Email - Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, OneDrive - WhatsApp  This app has all the BIG features you need:  * Color scanning, grayscale or black and white * Can be used in the office, school, home and anywhere else you want * Page edges are detected automatically * Thumbnail view of the list, sort scans by date or title * The application of the photo scanner is optimized to work very fast. * Universal - a single application that works on the United States phone ! * In addition, you can scan QR codes and bar codes, all in one application.  Download the Photo Scanner app now and make your life simple!
